title: Biscuit Dust
img_alt: Peggy Babcock's Biscuit Dust collected from our factory floor
body:
Like space dust only less 'poppy'!

Do your bit to fight food waste by helping yourself to our special Biscuit Dust treats.

We hand-gather the biscuit dust from our factories and sweep them into bags just for you!

Sprinkle a bit of Peggy Babcock's Biscuit dust on your favourite cereal or just eat straight from the bag - the choice is yours!
